name: Lost (itch) (donsaad)
description:
An evil wizard separated cats from their owners in two different worlds. Feeling lost and afraid, the cats and owners try to find each other and avoid evil traps. The inseparable connection between the owners and their cats makes the move aligned or else they feel lost and stop moving. 

Help the cats return to their owners safely by controlling both and unit them together in this side-stroller puzzle platformer game!

Artists: Dina Elshebiny, Omneya Sabry & Salma Hammoud

Programmers: Ahmed Samir & Mohamed Saad
